item.title: Mac OSx Convert Tip of the Day – keyboard shortcuts
item.description: The Mac OSx Convert has been reading up various selections of 101 of the best (or worst) OSx tips. Many of these tips don’t address the Keyboard shortcuts … on the newer Macbooks first tip is always press the Fn key to access function keys in the top row. Best tip of the day … here’s a long list from Apple of the Keyboard Shortcuts http://support.apple.com/kb/HT1343
